Translations.Text: tae puokke denhdaol knea ampi rueng avei
ku ampi damnoeng da saamkhan
del puokke kampoungte khvengkoumnit knea ampi vea
te. puokke kngte nung doeng
te. banteabmk puokke kngte nung doeng yeang chbasa
tae yeung minban bangkeut phendei aoy mean santhan reabasmae
ning phnom teanglay chea bangkol snoeng te ryy
haey yeung ban bangkeut puok anakchea kou (brosa ning srei)
haey yeung ban bangkeut kar dek robsa puok anak toukchea kar chhb samreak
haey yeung ban bangkeut peloyb chea kar betbang
haey yeung ban bangkeut pelothngai chea karorsanow
haey yeung ban bangkeut mekh brapir chean da rungmoam now pileu puok anak
haey yeung ban bangkeut preahatity del mean ponlu cheng chang
haey yeung ban banhchouh pi dom popk nouv tukaphlieng sraochasrap krob tikanleng
daembi yeung nung b po ch nh tamory vea nouv kreabthonhnhocheate ning roukkhcheate krob braphet
ning chamkar damnam del mean phleanouphl krob braphet
pitabrakd nasa thngai katsechakdei ku mean pelkamnt chbasaleasa
now thngai delke phlomtre pelnoh puok anak nung mk(kan kanleng chomnoumchomreah) chea krom
haey mekh nung trauv ke baekchamh pelnoh vea mean tvear cheachraen
haey phnom teanglay trauv ban ke thveu aoy r baek chenhpi kanleng robsa vea haey vea rsat dauch thouli
pitabrakd nasa nork cheu han nam kuchea kanleng triem
chea kanleng rsanow samreab puok del bampean
daoy puokke rsanow tinoh chea rieng rhaut
puokke min del skal rosacheate trachak now tinoh laey haeyka kmean tukphoek der
meante tuk kdaw ning khtoh bonnaoh
chea kar tabasnang da sam hetophl bamphot
pitabrakd nasa puokke kuchea puok del min sangkhumthanung chuob kar chomnoumchomreah laey
themtang puokke ban bdeseth nung ayeat robsa yeung tiet phng
haey avei teangoasa yeung ban kttra vea touk nowknong sievphow kamnttra( lav ho l mah hvou sa) ruoch chea se r ch
dau che neah chaur puok anak phloksa choh haey yeung min banthem avei aoy puok anak krawpi tearounakamm laey
pitabrakd nasa pheap chokchy ku samreab banda anak del kaotakhlach a l laoh
ku( puokke) mean chamkar damnam ning chamkar tompeangbaychour
ning mean sdrei prohmcheari cheachraen del mean vy smae knea
promteang kev del penh tow daoy sra ruoch chea se r ch
nowknong vea( thansuokr) puokke minlyy peakyasaamdei del it brayoch laey haeyka minlyy peakyaphoutkohk der
kuchea kar tabasnang pi mcheasa robsa anak del chea amnaoy muoy da penhlenh

ku mk pi mcheasa krobkrong mekh cheachraen chean ning phendei ning avei del now rveang vea teangpir . nih ku mk pi mcheasa mha sabborsa . puokke( mnoussa lok) min ach niyeay avei ban laey louhtrate mean karoanounhnhat pi trong

now thngai del chi pril ning mea la ai kat teanglay chhr tam rieb cheachuor puokke min ach niyeay avei ban laey leuklengte anaknea del mcheasa mha sabborsa anounhnhat aoy ke haey ke niyeay nouv peakyasaamdei na del troemotrauv bonnaoh

noh kuchea thngai del nung kaetlaeng yeang pitabrakd . dau che neah anaknea haey chng( kech phot pi pheap lombak now thngai barlok)noh chaur aoy ke chreusareusa kanleng vilotralb towkean mcheasa robsa ke choh

pitabrakd nasa yeung ban dasatuen promean puok anak nouv tearounakamm del now chit bamphot nea thngai del bokkol mnea k meultow champoh avei del dai teangpir robsa ke ban br pru td kanlongomk . haey anak kmean chomnue nung niyeay tha ao anichchea. thveu me d ch teub khnhom klaycha dei vinh
a l laoh sbath nung mea la ai kat del dk yk chivit puok del kmean chomnue daoy khorkhow
ning mea la ai kat del dk yk chivit anak mean chomnue daoy thnam
ning mea la ai kat del choh pi leumekh yeang luen
ning mea la ai kat del d nddae m knea noam prolung anak mean chomnue chhpaoh towkean thansuokr
ning mea la ai kat del riebcham batobanhchea robsa a l laoh
now thngai del( meankar phlomtre leuktimuoy) phendei ning phnom teanglay ronhchuoy yeang khlang( avei teangoasa trauv vineasa a nd reay)
kar phlomtre leuk tipir kaetmeanlaeng banteabpi leuktimuoy ( avei teangoasa trauv rsa laengvinh)
now thngai noh duong chetd( robsa puok kmean chomnue) phy nheabnhr
kevophnek robsa puokke tomleak choh daoysaar karphyokhlach
puokke( puok kmean chomnue) niyeay tha tae puok yeung pitchea trauv ban ke banhchoun towkean chivit daem( robsa puok yeung) vinh ryy
tae( ke pitchea banhchoun towkean chivit daem robsa puok yeung vinh ryy) nowpel del puok yeung ban klaycha chhaoeng pouk phoy haey noh
puokke ban niyeay tiet tha brasenbae dauchnaoh men noh kuchea kar vilotralb da khatabng
pitabrakd nasa vea kreante chea kar phlomtre( leuk tipir) muoy dng bonnaoh
pelnoh srabte puokke rsa laengvinh peasapenh phendei
rueng robsa mou sa pitchea ban mokadl anak( mou ham meat) ruochhaey
nowpel del mcheasa robsa ke haw ke now e chrolongophnom tou vea da pisedth
chaur anak( mou sa) towkean hvie r aon choh pitabrakd nasa ke chea anak bampean
chaur anak niyeay( towkean hvie r aon) tha tae anak chng mean pheap chreah saat der ryyte
haey chngaoy khnhom nenam anak towkean mcheasa robsa anak ( a l laoh) ruoch anak nung kaotakhlach trong der ryyte
pelnoh mou sa ban bangheanh aoy hvie r aon kheunh nouv mou chi hsaa t muoy da thom
te ke bercha ban bdeseth ning ban brachheang towvinh
banteabmk ke ban berokhnang daoy pyeayeam rk lbichakl brachheang nung mou sa
ruoch ke ban bramoul( bracha reasdr robsa ke) haey ke ban srek brakeasa
ning ban niyeay tha yeung kuchea mcheasa da khpangkhpasa robsa puok anak
dau che neah a l laoh ban daktondakamm ke teang nowknong lokey ning barlok
pitabrakd nasa nowknong rueng noh kuchea merien muoy samreab anaknea del kaotakhlach a l laoh
tae kar bangkeut puok anak( aoy rsa laengvinh sachathmei)lombak ryyka mekh del yeung ban bangkeut vea ruoch lombak cheang
trong ban leuk trongtreay robsa vea aoy khpasa ning ban thveu aoy vea reabasmae
haey trong ban thveu aoy reatreikeal robsa vea ngngut haey trong kaban b po ch nh ponlu robsa vea mokvinh der nowpel thngai
kraoypi noh mk trong ban thveu aoy phendei reabasmae
trong ban b po ch nh pi dei nouv tuk robsa vea ning roukkhcheate robsa vea
haey trong ban bangkeut phnom chea snoeng da rungmea
daembi chea phalobrayoch samreab puok anak ning satvapahn robsa puok anak
te nowpel del kroh m h nd reay da thom ban mokadl(thngai barlok)
thngai noh mnoussa lok nung nukkheunh nouv ei v del khuo l nban sang kanlongomk
haey phleung nork cheu hi m nung trauv ban ke bangheanh aoy kheunh yeang chbasa champoh anaknea del meulkheunh
chamnek e anaknea del ban bampean
ning sraleanh chaul chetd karorsanow knong lokey( cheang thngai barlok) noh
pitabrakd nasa nork cheu hi m kuchea tilomnow robsa ke
rie anaknea del kaotakhlach kar chhr nowchampohmoukh mcheasa robsa ke ning ban hamkhat khluon pi kar phleutaphleun noh
pitabrakd nasa thansuokr kuchea tilomnow robsa ke
puokke( puok mou sh ri ki n) nung suor anak( mou ham meat) ampi thngai barlok tha tae vea nung kaetlaeng nowpel na
anak minmen chea anakdoeng ampi pelvelea robsa vea laey
ti b pea ch b robsa vea ku meante mcheasa robsa anak te del doeng
tampit anak kreante chea anak dasatuen promean champoh anak na del khlach vea bonnaoh
now thngai del puokke kheunh vea( thngai barlok) puokke mean arommo hakbeidauchchea minban rsanow knong lokey nih laey leuklengte muoy lngeach ryy muoy pruk bonnaoh
keat( mou ham meat) ban thveumoukh kranhouv haey ngeak moukh chenh
piproh mean chn pikear phnek mneak ban chaul mk chuob keat
tae anak( mou ham meat) ach doeng yeang dau me d ch ban? chuonkal ke ach mk saamatakhluon
ryyka ke chngban kar kraenromluk haey kar kraenromluk noh ach phdal phalobrayoch dl ke
rie anak del meanotropy sa mb tde krobkrean ( min trauvkar kar changaoulobangheanh pi anak)
anak bercha yk chetd toukdeak champoh ke towvinh
haey mean banhhea avei champoh anak( mou ham meat) brasenbae ke saamatakhluon ( pi pheap kmean chomnue) noh
chamnek e anak del ban mk chuob anak daembi som kar changaoul bangheanh phlauv la
haey ke kaotakhlach a l laoh noh
anak bercha prongeuy k ndeu y champoh ke towvinh
chaur anak kom thveu bebnih . pitabrakd nasa vea(ayeat teangnih) kuchea kar kraenromluk
dau che neah anaknea haey meanbamnng ke pitchea nung yk vea ( kompir kuor an) thveuchea merien
del mean nowknong kompir del trauv ban ke leukatamkeung
brakabdaoy pheap khpangkhpasa promteang chreah saat
del now nung dai anak del sarser sar( mea la ai kat)
da laobrapei ning chea anak brate b tde tam a l laoh yeang khchabkhchuon
mnoussa lok trauv ban ke dakbandasa nouv avei delke ban brachheang nung mcheasa robsa ke
tae trong ban bangkeut ke( anak brachheang) ampi avei
trong ban b ngki t ke ampi tukkeam ruoch trong ban kamnt aoy ke ruoch chea se rch ( thngai slab leaphosakkar veasanea)
banteabmk trong ban samruol phlauv dl ke
kraoyomk trong thveu aoy ke slab ruoch dak ke nowknong phnaur
kraoyomk tiet nowpel del trong mean chetnea trong nung thveu aoy ke rsa laengvinh
te. ke min anouvotd tam avei del trong ban banhchea ke laey
dau che neah chaur aoy mnoussa lok meul towkean chamneiahar robsa ke choh
pitabrakd nasa yeung ban banhchouh tukaphlieng mk yeang chraen
banteabmk yeung ban bambek dei chea bamnek
ruoch yeung ban b no dah thonhnhocheate krob braphet now leu vea
ning daem tompeangbaychour ning banle
ning daem au liv ning daem leu m
ning suonutyean del mean daemchheu thom cheachraen
ning phleanouphl haeyning roukkhcheate samreab satvapahn
chea phalobrayoch samreab puok anak ning satvapahn robsa puok anak
haey nowpel del samrek( kar phlomtre leuk tipir) yeang khlang ban mokadl
now thngai del mnoussa rtkech chenhpi bangobaaun robsa ke
ning mdeay robsa ke ning aupouk robsa ke
ning braponth robsa ke ning kaunchaw robsa ke
champoh bokkol mnea k knongchamnaom puokke now thngai noh ku kittepi khluoneng bonnaoh
tukmoukh( robsa anak mean chomnue) now thngai noh ku mean pheap rikreay
saech sabbayrikreay( champoh damnoengola sdeipi thansuokr)
haey tukmoukh( robsa anak kmean chomnue) now thngai noh ku braleak thouli
pheap khmaw ngngut krobadandab phtaimoukh( robsa puokke)
puok teangnoh haey kuchea puok kmean chomnue del br pru td ampeuaeakrak bamphot
nowpel del preahatity trauv ban ke thveu aoy bat rosmei
ning nowpel del hvaung phkay ban thleak bakbek
ning nowpel del phnom trauv ban ke thveu aoy rsat dauch thouli
ning nowpel del satv audth meanophtaipoh trauv ban ke baohbng chaol
ning nowpel del satv sahav trauv ban ke bramoulophdom
ning nowpel del tukasamoutr trauv ban ke thveu aoy cheh chea andataphleung
ning nowpel del prolung trauv ban ke banhchoul tow knong khluon robsa ke vinh
ning nowpel tearikea delke ban kb teang rsa trauv ban ke suor tha
daoysaar babakamm ei v ban chea neang trauv ban ke samleab
ning nowpel del sievphow kamntheto(ampeula ning ampeuaeakrak) trauv ban ke leatatradeang
ning nowpel del mekh trauv ban ke yk chenhpi kanleng robsa vea
ning nowpel del phleung nork cheu hi m trauv ban ke thveu aoy cheh yeang santhosanthow
ning nowpel del thansuokr trauv ban ke dak aoy now chit ( anak del kaotakhlach a l laoh)
(pelnoh) bokkol krobroub nung doeng ampi avei delke ban br pru td kanlongomk
chea karpit nasa yeung sbath nung hvaung phkay del lich bat
ning hau v ng phkay del daertamokonlong robsa vea yeang luen ruoch ka lich bat
ning peloyb nowpel del vea mokadl ti b pea ch b
ning pel prolum nowpel del vea b po ch nh ponlu
pitabrakd nasa kompir kuor an ku neamk tamory peaky saamdei robsa anakneasar( chi pri l) da thkomthkaeng
del mean anoupheap khlangokla( knong karottuolkhosatrauv leu karngear) ning mean than khpangkhpasa champoh mcheasa nei a r sh
del chea anak trauv ke korp now tinoh ning chea anak smaohtrang
haey mi td robsa puok anak( mou ham meat) minmen chea mnoussaavikl chrit laey
haey chea karpit nasa keat( mou ham meat) bankheunh ke ( chi pri l) yeang chbasa now e cheungmekh
haey ke( mou ham meat) min kamnanh leu kar phsaapvophsaeay brakear athrkambang( sar robsa a l laoh) laey
haey kompir kuor an ka minmen chea peakyasaamdei robsa shai tn del trauv ke dakbandasa der
hetonih tae sate robsa puok del bdeseth nung kompir kuor an townea asahaey
vea( kompir kuor an) kmeanoavei krawpi kar romluk dl piphp teang asanoh laey
samreab anaknea del mean bamnng chng daer leu meakra da troem trauv knongchamnaom puok anak
haey puok anak min ach mean bamnng thveuavei muoy ban laey leuklengte a l laoh del chea mcheasa krobkrong piphp teangoasa mean chetnea bonnaoh
nowpel del mekh ban be reah bek
ning nowpel del php teanglay ban bak thleak khe t ch khtei
ning nowpel del tukasamoutr trauv ban ke bamphtoh laeng
ning nowpel del phnaur teanglay trauv ban ke bamphosa laeng
mnoussa mnea k nung ban doeng nouv avei del khluon ban sang kanlongomk ning avei del khluon mintean sang
ao mnoussa lok. tae avei tow del ban baokabrasa anak aoyothveu shi ri k champoh mcheasa robsa anak da thkomthkaeng
del ban bangkeut anak ruoch thveu aoy anak mean roubreang penhlenh promteang phdal aoy anak nouv lokkhan la samoromy
knong roubreang namuoy del trong mean chetnea trong nung bangkeut anak noh
min dauchnaoh te. phtoytowvinh puok anak bercha bdeseth nung thngai chomnoumchomreah( thngai barlok) towvinh
haey pitabrakd nasa puok anak ku mean anak tam khleameul ( mea la ai kat)
chea anak thkomthkaeng ning chea anak kttra( real ampeu robsa anak)
puokke( mea la ai kat) doeng nouv avei del puok anak br pru td
pitabrakd nasa banda anak del ban sang ampeula ku sthet knong thansuokr na ai m
haey pitabrakd nasa puok del br pru td ampeuaeakrak ku sthet knong nork cheu hi m
puokke nung chaul tow knong thanonork noh now thngai chomnoumchomreah(thngai barlok)
haey puokke min ach kechvih pi vea ban laey
tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha thngai chomnoumchomreah chea avei noh
banteabmk tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha thngai chomnoumchomreah chea avei noh
kuchea thngai del kmean bokkol na mneak ach meanamnach avei chuoy dl bokkol mneaktiet ban laey . haey se ch kei d sa me r ch now thngai noh kuchea kammosetthi robsa a l laoh temuoyokt
pheap vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del keibanlom
chea puok del teamtear chngban krob chamnuon nowpel del puokke thloeng veasa ryy veal pi anakadtei
te nowpel del puokke veasa ryy veal ryy thloeng aoy anakadtei ku puokke thveu aoy khveah
tae puok teangnoh min kit tha pitabrakd nasa puokke nung trauv ke thveu aoy rsa laengvinh
now thngai muoy da thomtheng( thngai barlok) te ryy
ku now thngai del mnoussa lok nung chhr nowchampohmoukh mcheasa krobkrong piphp teangoasa
min dauchnaoh te. karpit banhchi robsa puok br pru td ampeuaeakrak ku sthet knong sai chchi n
tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha sai chchi n chea avei noh
kuchea banhchi muoy del trauv ban ke kttra touk
pheap vineasa a nd reay now thngai noh ku samreab puok del bdeseth
kuchea puok del bdeseth nung thngai chomnoumchomreah
haey kmean anaknea mneak ach bdeseth nung vea krawpi puok del bampean br pru td babakamm noh laey
nowpel mean ke sautr ayeat robsa yeung aoy ke sdab ke bercha ban niyeay tha nih kuchea rueng pe r ng nitean towvinh
te. phtoytowvinh avei( babakamm) del puokke br pru td noh ban krobadandab leu chetd robsa puokke
te. pitabrakd nasa puokke nung trauv ke betbang pi kar meulkheunh mcheasa robsa puokke now thngai noh( thngai barlok)
kraoyomk puokke pitchea nung trauv chaul nork cheu hi m
kraoyomk tiet mean ke niyeay tha nih haey kuchea avei del puok anak thleab bdeseth nung vea noh
te. pitabrakd nasa banhchi robsa banda anak del sang ampeula ku sthet knong ai lli you n
tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha ai lli you n chea avei noh
kuchea banhchi muoy del trauv ban ke kttra touk
del banda mea la ai kat kampoungte thveusaeaksaei champoh banhchi noh
pitabrakd nasa banda anak del sang ampeula ku sthetnow knong thansuokr na ai m
daoy puokke angkouy now leu kre koyokn( vottho neanea)
anak nung meulkheunh pheap sabbayrikreay now leu phtaimoukh robsa puokke
puokke nung trauv ke aoy ttuoltean sora da brisotth del trauv ban bet chit
klen robsa vea kraaub bamphot . haey daembi ban dauchnih chaur aoy banda anak del brakuotabracheng brakuotabracheng knea choh
haey kar leay robsa vea ku ampi tuk nowknong thansuokr
kuchea braphp tuk del banda anak mean than khpangkhpasa ttuol tean vea
pitabrakd nasa puok del ban br pru td ampeuaeakrak(now knong lokey) puokke thleab saechchamak aoy banda anak del mean chomnue
haey nowpel del puokke ban daerkat banda anak del mean chomnue puokke tengte samdeng kar chamakalakleuy
haey nowpel del puokke tralb towkean baksaapuok robsa ke vinh ku puokke tralb daoy kar chamakdak anak mean chomnue
haey nowpel del puokke bankheunh banda anak del mean chomnue puokke niyeay tha pitabrakd nasa puok teangnih cheapuok del v nge v ng
haey puokke( puok kmean chomnue) min trauv ban ke chattang chea anakakhleameul banda anak del mean chomnue laey
dau che neah now thngainih( thngai barlok) banda anak del mean chomnue saechchamak champoh puok del kmean chomnue vinh
puokke angkouy now leu kre koyokn( vottho neanea)
tae puok kmean chomnue trauv ban ke tabasnang nouv avei del puokke thleab ban br pru td der ryyte
nowpel del mekh trauv ban bekbak
haey vea ban sdabbangkeab ning brate b tde tam mcheasa robsa vea
haey nowpel del phendei trauv ban leatasanthung
haey vea ban b po ch nh nouv avei del mean nowknong khluon robsa vea haey thveu aoy tte saat
haey vea ban sdabbangkeab ning brate b tde tam mcheasa robsa vea
ao mnoussa lok. pitabrakd nasa anak kuchea anak del kham broengobreng sang champoh mcheasa robsa anak( tohchea ampeula ryy akrak) anak nung chuob trong cheaminkhan( now thngai barlok)
haey chamnek e anak del trauv ban ke brakl sievphow kamntheto robsa ke now daisda
ke nung trauv ttuol nouv kar katsechakdei yeang ngeayosruol bamphot
haey ke nung trauv tralb towkean kruosaear robsa ke vinh daoy sechakdeirikreay kraileng
rie anak del trauv ban ke brakl nouv sievphow robsa ke now dai che v ng pikraoyokhnang robsa ke
ke nung srek danghoy tha vineasa a nd reay haey khnhom
haey ke nung chaul knong phleung nork del cheh yeang santho santhow
pitabrakd nasa ke thleab rsanow knong lokey cheamuoynung krom kruosaear robsa ke yeang sabbayrikreay
pitabrakd nasa ke ban kitthea ke nung min trauv vilotralb ( towkean a l laoh) vinh laey
min dauchnaoh te. pitabrakd nasa mcheasa robsa ke doeng bamphot champoh roubke
dau che neah yeung sbath nung pelothngai rieb lich
ning peloyb ning avei del ban bramoulophdom
ning preah chnt nowpel del vea ban reah penhovng
puok anak nung vivodd pi damnakkal muoy tow damnakkal muoy ( nowknong lokey)
dau che neah tae mean rueng ei v tow ban chea puokke kmean chomnue
haey nowpel del mean ke sautr kompir kuor an aoy puokke sdab puokke min saou chout laey
min tebonnaoh puok del kmean chomnue themtang bdeseth tiet phng
haey a l laoh doeng bamphot nouv avei del puokke leak touk now knong chetd
dau che neah chaur anak( mou ham meat) brab puokke ampi tearounakamm da sen chhucheab choh
leuklengte banda anak del mean chomnue ning ban sang ampeula troemotrauv bonnaoh . puokke nung ttuol ban phalbony daoy it konnea
a l laoh sbath nung mekh del mean phkay cheachraen
ning thngai del ban sanyea( thngai barlok)
ning anak del thveusaeaksaei haeyning phosdo tang teanglay del ke yk mk bangheanh
ke ban dakbandasa champoh krom au kh tout( chea puok del chik rondaw samleab anak mean chomnue)
chea rondaw phleung del mean kamnat ausa
khn del puokke angkouy now choumvinh rondaw phleung noh
daoy puokke samlung meul towleu avei del puokke kampoung br pru td towleu banda anak del mean chomnue
haey puokke ban thveubeab banda anak del mean chomnue ku daoy sar te puokke mean chomnue leu a l laoh da mha khlangpouke ning chea ti kaotasarsaer
kuchea anak del mean karokrobkrong mekh cheachraen chean ning phendei . haey a l laoh kuchea saksaei towleu avei teangoasa

pitabrakd nasa puok del dot banda anak del mean chomnue brosasrei banteabmk puokke minban sarphap tosakamhosa ( champoh a l laoh) te noh puokke nung trauv ttuol tearounakamm nowknong nork cheu han nam ning ttuol tearounakamm del chabcheh yeang chhucheab bamphot

khnhom robsa a l laoh( mou ham meat) nowpel delke sa lat te ryy

tae anak( mou ham meat) ylkheunh yeang dauch me d ch der brasen bae ke( a pou cha ha l) ban bdeseth ning berchenh( pi chomnue) noh

yeung nung haw anakyeam nork( daembi chab ke baoh tomleak tow knong nork)

haey tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha yb a l k d chea avei noh
yb a l k d noh ku brasaer cheang muoy pean khe
mea la ai kat cheachraen ning chi pri l choh mk knong yb noh daoy mean karoanounhnhat pi mcheasa robsa puokke daembi anouvotd real batobanhchea
nowknong yb noh der porpenh tow daoy sechakdeisokh sa ndi pheap rhautadl hva cheu rlech laeng

(phosdo tang noh) ku anakneasar mneak( mou ham meat)mk pi a l laoh delke nung sautr kompir da saatasam( kompir kuor an)
del nowknong kompir noh ku meanochbab ning meakra da troemotrauv

haey puokke min trauv ban ke banhchea aoy theu v avei krawpi aoy puokke korp sakkar champoh a l laoh daoy chetd smaoh sa ning troemotrauv champoh trong ning brate b tde sa lat promteang brichcheak hsaa kat noh laey . haey noh kuchea sasanea da troemotrauv

pitabrakd nasa puok del kmean chomnue nei puok aah li ki tab ning puok mou sh ri kin ku se th t nowknong thanonork cheu han nam del puokke nowknong noh chea amt . puok teangnoh kuchea puok del akrak bamphot nei satv lok
pitabrakd nasa banda anak del mean chomnue ning ban sang ampeula troemotrauv . anak teangnoh kuchea anak del la bamphot nei satvalok

kar tabasnang robsa puokke now e mcheasa robsa puokke ku thansuokr at ni n del mean t ne l cheachraen haur pi kraom vea daoy puokke sthetnow tinoh chea amt . a l laoh ban ylprom cheamuoy puokke . haey puokke kaban ylprom cheamuoy trong vinh der . kar tabasnang nih ku samreab anak del kaotakhlach mcheasa robsa ke
nowpel del phendei trauv ban ke thveu aoy ronhchuoy yeang khlangokla
haey phendei ban b po ch nh nouv sakasap teangoasa del mean nowknong khluon robsa vea
haey mnoussa lok ka niyeay tha tae mean rueng avei kaet laeng champoh phendei nih
now thngai noh vea nung brakeasabrab nouv ruengreav robsa vea

ning avei del mean nowknong chetd( robsa mnoussa) nung trauv ke leatatradeang aoy kheunh yeang chbasa noh
